        public void moveStates(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> mapping)
                throws PrismException
        Update the acceptance condition upon renaming of states acording to the mapping (part of AcceptanceCondition interface). Assumes that states can only get a lower name.
        Parameters:
        mapping - vector with mapping a[i] -> j
        Throws:
        PrismException

         throws PrismException

      • getMyBitSetForState

        private MyBitSet getMyBitSetForState(int state_index,
                                     java.util.Vector<MyBitSet> acc)
        Calculate the MyBitSet for a state from the acceptance pairs, store result in result.
        Parameters:
        state_index - the state
        acc - the MyBitSetVector (either _L or _U)
        result - the MyBitSet where the results are stored, has to be clear at the beginning!
